entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
